reviewText: Was ok transfer to blu ray. Much better than DVD quality. Would be nice to get USA transfer to blu ray. The quality would/should be even better

The movie is a masterpiece, no need to comment on it. I just want to mention that the imported Blu-ray from Spain WORKS IN THE US, in any bluray player. It says "Region B" in the box but it's actually REGION-FREE. Good picture quality, until Liongate or someone releases a remaster for the US, THIS IS THE VERSION TO BUY.
The movie is awesome but the blue ray is not so awesome. Although you can view it English, the clarity of a blue ray isn't there.

This has always been one of my favorite movies, but even the DVD version was blurry and unclear on my 160" screen. Now we have a pristine print that is just beautify! If you love this movie it is a MUST OWN!
bought this was very excited, when I received it ,it would't play in my sony blu ray player. Read the reviews and said it would play in USA blu ray player but did not. Very disappointed.
Didn't know it wasn't an English version.
i did not realize it was not in English
BluRay great!  No English subtitles BAD!
wonderful telling of Jesus' life and ministry - done so very well!

This is the best and most interesting of all the movies made of the life of Jesus. Patched with clips of the Sanhedrin, Pilate, Herod and people from the crowd it presents a depiction of the life of Christ that is acceptable to Christians and others who want to learn about Jesus. The death of Christ and the scene where Mary, the mother of Jesus, accepts his body at the foot of the cross is very moving. The sound can be chosen in Spanish or English. Directed by Franco Zeffirelli, the work on 2 Blue Ray discs lasts 6 hours and 24 minutes.
Good (although not totally Biblical) movie. Better video quality than the DVD so I'm happy.
Why is the best version of the story of Jesus being held up for Blu-Ray??  By far the best Jesus movie ever.
Worked on my PlayStation 3 in USA.
